intro: Achimenes elegans-multiflora, commonly known as the everlasting bell, is a tropical perennial plant native to Central and South America. It is characterized by its striking, trumpet-shaped flowers that come in a variety of colors, including red, pink, and white. The plant has heart-shaped leaves and produces numerous blooms throughout the growing season. It thrives in warm, humid environments and requires well-draining soil. Achimenes elegans-multiflora is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its vibrant flowers and long-lasting blooms.
